person.persName: Sanford Ppool (Breckinridge County, Kentucky, gunsmith and farmer)

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, gunsmith and farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Polly Ppool. Father of Stephen Ppool, Huston Ppool, Rebecca Ppool, William Ppool, and Eveline Ppool. Gunsmith in Breckinridge County in 1850. Gunsmith and farmer in Breckinridge County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in 1850 and eight in 1860.
